rights.title: Right to Access:
rights.description: Users have the right to request and access their personal information held by the website or digital agency.

rights.title: Right to Rectification:
rights.description: Users can request corrections or updates to inaccurate or incomplete personal information.

rights.title: Right to Erasure (Right to be Forgotten)
rights.description: Users have the right to request the deletion of their personal information under certain circumstances.

rights.title: Right to Restrict Processing:
rights.description: Users can request limitations on how their personal information is processed.

rights.title: Right to Data Portability:
rights.description: Users can request their personal data in a structured, commonly used, and machine-readable format for transfer to another service.

rights.title: Right to Object:
rights.description: Users can object to the processing of their personal information, particularly for direct marketing purposes.

rights.title: Right to Withdraw Consent:
rights.description: If the processing is based on user consent, they have the right to withdraw that consent at any time.

rights.title: Right to Lodge a Complaint:
rights.description: Users can file a complaint with the relevant data protection authority if they believe their rights are being violated.

rights.title: Right to Non-Discrimination:
rights.description: Users should not be subjected to discriminatory practices for exercising their privacy rights.

rights.title: Right to Information Security:
rights.description: Users have the right to expect that their personal information is handled securely and protected from unauthorized access.

rights.title: Right to Direct Marketing:
rights.description: Users have the right to stop receiving unwanted direct marketing.

rights.title: Right to Know How Your Information is Used:
rights.description: The right to know whether your personal information is sold or disclosed and to whom.
